metadata.name: SI-I
metadata.description: The universe is something that is beyond our imagination. From our childhood to science fiction films, we always try to fantasize about it. In this Space Invaders special edition from the Iridescence series, I tried to induce the viewer's imagination in the existence of some extraterrestrial worlds with quite unusual life forms, only using macro photography and bubbles made primarily of three liquids, water, soap and glycerin.
